error.checks: At least one service is unavailable.
head.title: Fastfony installation
step1.default: By default, for dev environment, Fastfony is ready to be used with SQLite database and locally send and catch email with Mailpit. If you want to use an other database system and/or an other mailer service you can configure your own.
step1.help:
and edit users, password, hosts etc...
And don't forget to prepare a .env.local for your prod environment !
step1.instruction: At root of your project, manually create a file named <quote class="font-bold">`.env.local`</quote> with this content :
step1.more_infos: For more informations, follow this links:
step1.title: Configure app secret, access to database and mailer service
step2.help: An email with connection link will be sent. You can customize this email later, more infos here.
step2.instruction: If we use default configuration with Mailpit, you can see emails in your browser : http://127.0.0.1:8025
step2.title: The admin user can access to /admin
step3.instruction:
Your Fastfony installation is successfully finished! You have received an email with a link to connect.

If we use default configuration with Mailpit, you can see emails in your browser : http://127.0.0.1:8025
step3.title: Congrats!
